/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, and people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
